"

Lorem Ipsum

Apollo 11 was the spaceflight that landed the first humans, Americans Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin, on the Moon on July 20th, 1969, at 20:18 UTC. Armstrong became the first to step onto the lunar surface 6 hours later on July 21st at 02:56 UTC.
